content.rendered:
Don’t miss the SSCSD Bike Rodeo on Thursday, May 4 from 4-6 p.m. at East Side Recreation Park.  This FREE event includes mechanics on site for minor maintenance, a helmet fitting station, bike safety stations, games, a bike obstacle course, and a mascot race. 

Other information:

  • Parents; please plan to accompany your children
  • Wear a helmet – a supply of helmets will be donated for those in need
  • Minor adjustments and repairs ONLY – any bike in need of major repair
    work will be referred to a bike shop
  • Consider biking over as a family – parking may be limited
  • Excess parking is available at Caroline Str. School & St. Clement’s School

All kids participating in the event can fill out a raffle ticket for a chance to win a
new kids’ bike from Trek Bicycles (up to $350) plus other small prizes!

Thanks to Lake Avenue SWAT & PTA, Trek & Grey Ghost Bicycles, SSPD  & SSFD, the Army National Guard, Martin Harding & Mazzotti, Eddy F’s,
BikeaToga, Saratoga Shredders, Scouts Pack and Troop 4016, and our
mechanics/volunteers for their generous support of this event!
